name: bytes
command:
input = eval(input)
const sizes = ["", "K", "M", "G", "T", "P", "E", "Z", "Y"]; const LEN = sizes.length; let index = Math.floor(Math.log(input) / Math.log(1024)); let val = input / (1024 ** index); let suffix = index < LEN ? sizes[index] : "?"; print(`${val.toFixed(2)}${suffix}B`);
